availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ephraim A. Simmons (Carter County, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farm hand. Ohio native. Son of Roland Simmons and Mary Simmons. Married to Sarah M. McGlone in Carter County on December 23, 1861. Farm hand in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 65.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994030, Carter County Marriages, p. unknown.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7017525, Carter County Deaths, file #27216.
